mapper.select: select min(t1.data_scope) from sys_role t1, sys_user_role t2 where t1.id = t2.role_id and t2.user_id = #{userId} and t1.db_status = 1 and t2.db_status = 1
select * from sys_role where db_status != 0 and name = #{name}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO sys_role ( name, remark, data_scope, org_id, db_status, creator, create_time ) VALUES ( #{name}, #{remark}, #{dataScope}, #{orgId}, #{dbStatus}, #{creator}, #{createTime})
